item.title: A Tale of One More City
item.description: ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.1.0 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.3.4 ✔ dplyr 0.7.6 ## ✔ tidyr 0.7.2 ✔ stringr 1.2.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.2.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() yelp_df_all <- lapply(all_businesses_list, unlist) %>% lapply(., as.list) %>% lapply(., as.data.frame, stringsAsFactors = F) %>% bind_rows() %>% as_tibble() ## # A tibble: 78,323 x 32 ## id alias ## <chr> <chr> ## 1 OCPzx3gU8JkiJ1laTcpy7g strandbad-werder-mario-müller-werder ## 2 J8uT9qybmk1EJkZQX7V8Qw la-riva-werder-havel ## 3 J8uT9qybmk1EJkZQX7V8Qw la-riva-werder-havel ## 4 J8uT9qybmk1EJkZQX7V8Qw la-riva-werder-havel ## 5 J8uT9qybmk1EJkZQX7V8Qw la-riva-werder-havel ## 6 J8uT9qybmk1EJkZQX7V8Qw la-riva-werder-havel ## 7 J8uT9qybmk1EJkZQX7V8Qw la-riva-werder-havel ## 8 QzK3Sn2SKQgLTPYD4TlbKg restaurant-haus-am-see-caputh ## 9 6UMy7mZIVNbC2UK8Wxd4jA landhaus-ferch ## 10 r3B68IINW0Z8TP9ZVanv-w bootsklause-ferch ## # .
